name: HomeNFTOmnibridge
description: HomeNFTOmnibridge. Home side implementation for multi-token ERC721 mediator intended to work on top of AMB bridge. It is designed to be used as an implementation contract of EternalStorageProxy contract.

eventDecorators.name: FailedMessageFixed
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: NewTokenRegistered
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: TokenBridgingDisabled
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: TokenExecutionDisabled
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: TokensBridged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: TokensBridgingInitiated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

functionDecorators.name: bridgeContract
functionDecorators.description: Get the AMB interface for the bridge contract address.

returnDecorators.description: AMB interface for the bridge contract address.

functionDecorators.name: bridgedTokenAddress
functionDecorators.description: Retrieves address of the bridged token contract associated with a specific native token contract on the other side.

parameterDecorators.name: _nativeToken
parameterDecorators.description: address of the native token contract on the other side.

returnDecorators.description: address of the deployed bridged token contract.

functionDecorators.name: deployAndHandleBridgedNFT
functionDecorators.description: Handles the bridged token for the first time, includes deployment of new ERC721TokenProxy contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of the native ERC721 token on the other side.

parameterDecorators.name: _name
parameterDecorators.description: name of the native token, name suffix will be appended, if empty, symbol will be used instead.

parameterDecorators.name: _symbol
parameterDecorators.description: symbol of the bridged token, if empty, name will be used instead.

parameterDecorators.name: _recipient
parameterDecorators.description: address that will receive the tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenIds
parameterDecorators.description: unique ids of the bridged tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _values
parameterDecorators.description: amounts of bridged tokens. Should be empty list for ERC721.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenURIs
parameterDecorators.description: URIs for the bridged token instances.

functionDecorators.name: disableTokenBridging
functionDecorators.description: Disabled bridging operations for the particular token.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of the token contract, or address(0) for configuring the global restriction.

parameterDecorators.name: _disable
parameterDecorators.description: true for disabling.

functionDecorators.name: disableTokenExecution
functionDecorators.description: Disabled execution operations for the particular token.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of the token contract, or address(0) for configuring the global restriction.

parameterDecorators.name: _disable
parameterDecorators.description: true for disabling.

functionDecorators.name: fixFailedMessage
functionDecorators.description: Handles the request to fix transferred assets which bridged message execution failed on the other network. Compares the reconstructed message checksum with the original one. Revert if message params were altered.

parameterDecorators.name: _messageId
parameterDecorators.description: id of the message which execution failed on this side of the bridge.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of the bridged token on this side of the bridge.

parameterDecorators.name: _sender
parameterDecorators.description: address of the tokens sender on this side of the bridge.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenIds
parameterDecorators.description: ids of the sent tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _values
parameterDecorators.description: amounts of tokens sent.

functionDecorators.name: fixMediatorBalanceERC1155
functionDecorators.description: Allows to send to the other network some ERC1155 token that can be forced into the contract without the invocation of the required methods. Before calling this method, it must be carefully investigated how imbalance happened in order to avoid an attempt to steal the funds from a token with double addresses.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of the token contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _receiver
parameterDecorators.description: the address that will receive the token on the other network.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenIds
parameterDecorators.description: unique ids of the bridged tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _values
parameterDecorators.description: corresponding amounts of the bridged tokens.

functionDecorators.name: fixMediatorBalanceERC721
functionDecorators.description: Allows to send to the other network some ERC721 token that can be forced into the contract without the invocation of the required methods. (e. g. regular transferFrom without a call to onERC721Received) Before calling this method, it must be carefully investigated how imbalance happened in order to avoid an attempt to steal the funds from a token with double addresses.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of the token contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _receiver
parameterDecorators.description: the address that will receive the token on the other network.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenIds
parameterDecorators.description: unique ids of the bridged tokens.

functionDecorators.name: forwardingRulesManager
functionDecorators.description: Retrieves an address of the forwarding rules manager contract.

returnDecorators.description: address of the forwarding rules manager contract.

functionDecorators.name: gasLimitManager
functionDecorators.description: Retrieves an address of the gas limit manager contract.

returnDecorators.description: address of the gas limit manager contract.

functionDecorators.name: getBridgeInterfacesVersion
functionDecorators.description: Tells the bridge interface version that this contract supports.

returnDecorators.name: major
returnDecorators.description: value of the version.

returnDecorators.name: minor
returnDecorators.description: value of the version.

returnDecorators.name: patch
returnDecorators.description: value of the version.

functionDecorators.name: getBridgeMode
functionDecorators.description: Tells the bridge mode that this contract supports.

returnDecorators.name: _data
returnDecorators.description: 4 bytes representing the bridge mode.

functionDecorators.name: handleBridgedNFT
functionDecorators.description: Handles the bridged token for the already registered token pair. Checks that the bridged token is inside the execution limits and invokes the Mint accordingly.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of the native ERC721 token on the other side.

parameterDecorators.name: _recipient
parameterDecorators.description: address that will receive the tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenIds
parameterDecorators.description: unique ids of the bridged tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _values
parameterDecorators.description: amounts of bridged tokens. Should be empty list for ERC721.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenURIs
parameterDecorators.description: URIs for the bridged token instances.

functionDecorators.name: handleNativeNFT
functionDecorators.description: Handles the bridged token that are native to this chain. Checks that the bridged token is inside the execution limits and invokes the Unlock accordingly.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of the native ERC721 token contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _recipient
parameterDecorators.description: address that will receive the tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenIds
parameterDecorators.description: unique ids of the bridged tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _values
parameterDecorators.description: amounts of bridged tokens. Should be empty list for ERC721.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Stores the initial parameters of the mediator.

parameterDecorators.name: _bridgeContract
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the AMB bridge contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _mediatorContract
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the mediator contract on the other network.

parameterDecorators.name: _gasLimitManager
parameterDecorators.description: the gas limit manager contract address.

parameterDecorators.name: _owner
parameterDecorators.description: address of the owner of the mediator contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _imageERC721
parameterDecorators.description: address of the ERC721 token image.

parameterDecorators.name: _imageERC1155
parameterDecorators.description: address of the ERC1155 token image.

parameterDecorators.name: _forwardingRulesManager
parameterDecorators.description: address of the NFTForwardingRulesManager contract that will be used for managing lane permissions.

functionDecorators.name: isBridgedTokenDeployAcknowledged
functionDecorators.description: Checks if for a given native token, the deployment of its bridged alternative was already acknowledged.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of native token contract.

returnDecorators.description: true, if bridged token was already deployed.

functionDecorators.name: isRegisteredAsNativeToken
functionDecorators.description: Checks if a given token is a bridged token that is native to this side of the bridge.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of token contract.

returnDecorators.description: message id of the send message.

functionDecorators.name: isTokenBridgingAllowed
functionDecorators.description: Tells if the bridging operations for the particular token are allowed.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of the token contract.

returnDecorators.description: true, if bridging operations are allowed.

functionDecorators.name: isTokenExecutionAllowed
functionDecorators.description: Tells if the execution operations for the particular token are allowed.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of the token contract.

returnDecorators.description: true, if execution operations are allowed.

functionDecorators.name: isTokenRegistered
functionDecorators.description: Checks if specified token was already bridged at least once and it is registered in the Omnibridge.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of the token contract.

returnDecorators.description: true, if token was already bridged.

functionDecorators.name: mediatorContractOnOtherSide
functionDecorators.description: Tells the mediator contract address from the other network.

returnDecorators.description: the address of the mediator contract.

functionDecorators.name: mediatorOwns
functionDecorators.description: Tells amount of owned tokens recorded at this mediator. More strict than regular token.ownerOf()/token.balanceOf() checks, since does not take into account forced tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of token contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenId
parameterDecorators.description: id of the new owned token.

returnDecorators.name: amount
returnDecorators.description: of owned tokens, 0 or 1 for ERC721 NFTs.

functionDecorators.name: messageFixed
functionDecorators.description: Tells if a message sent to the AMB bridge has been fixed.

returnDecorators.description: bool indicating the status of the message.

functionDecorators.name: nativeTokenAddress
functionDecorators.description: Retrieves address of the native token contract associated with a specific bridged token contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _bridgedToken
parameterDecorators.description: address of the created bridged token contract on this side.

returnDecorators.description: address of the native token contract on the other side of the bridge.

functionDecorators.name: onERC1155BatchReceived
functionDecorators.description: ERC1155 transfer callback function.

parameterDecorators.name: _from
parameterDecorators.description: address of token sender.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenIds
parameterDecorators.description: unique ids of the received tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _values
parameterDecorators.description: amounts of received tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: additional transfer data, can be used for passing alternative receiver address.

functionDecorators.name: onERC1155Received
functionDecorators.description: ERC1155 transfer callback function.

parameterDecorators.name: _from
parameterDecorators.description: address of token sender.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenId
parameterDecorators.description: id of the transferred token.

parameterDecorators.name: _value
parameterDecorators.description: amount of received tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: additional transfer data, can be used for passing alternative receiver address.

functionDecorators.name: onERC721Received
functionDecorators.description: ERC721 transfer callback function.

parameterDecorators.name: _from
parameterDecorators.description: address of token sender.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenId
parameterDecorators.description: id of the transferred token.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: additional transfer data, can be used for passing alternative receiver address.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Tells the address of the owner.

returnDecorators.description: the address of the owner.

functionDecorators.name: relayToken
functionDecorators.description: Initiate the bridge operation for some token from msg.sender to msg.sender on the other side. The user should first call Approve method of the ERC721 token.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: bridged token contract address.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenId
parameterDecorators.description: id of token to be transferred to the other network.

functionDecorators.name: relayToken
functionDecorators.description: Initiate the bridge operation for some token from msg.sender. The user should first call Approve method of the ERC721 token.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: bridged token contract address.

parameterDecorators.name: _receiver
parameterDecorators.description: address that will receive the token on the other network.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenId
parameterDecorators.description: id of the token to be transferred to the other network.

functionDecorators.name: requestFailedMessageFix
functionDecorators.description: Method to be called when a bridged message execution failed. It will generate a new message requesting to fix/roll back the transferred assets on the other network. It is important to specify parameters very carefully. Please, take exact values from the TokensBridgingInitiated event. Otherwise, execution will revert.

parameterDecorators.name: _messageId
parameterDecorators.description: id of the message which execution failed.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of the bridged token on the other side of the bridge.

parameterDecorators.name: _sender
parameterDecorators.description: address of the tokens sender on the other side.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenIds
parameterDecorators.description: ids of the sent tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _values
parameterDecorators.description: amounts of tokens sent.

functionDecorators.name: setBridgeContract
functionDecorators.description: Sets the AMB bridge contract address. Only the owner can call this method.

parameterDecorators.name: _bridgeContract
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the bridge contract.

functionDecorators.name: setCustomMetadata
functionDecorators.description: Sets the custom metadata for the given ERC721/ERC1155 token. Only owner can call this method. Useful when original NFT token does not implement neither name() nor symbol() methods.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of the token contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _name
parameterDecorators.description: custom name for the token contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _symbol
parameterDecorators.description: custom symbol for the token contract.

functionDecorators.name: setCustomTokenAddressPair
functionDecorators.description: Allows to pre-set the bridged token contract for not-yet bridged token. Only the owner can call this method.

parameterDecorators.name: _nativeToken
parameterDecorators.description: address of the token contract on the other side that was not yet bridged.

parameterDecorators.name: _bridgedToken
parameterDecorators.description: address of the bridged token contract.

functionDecorators.name: setForwardingRulesManager
functionDecorators.description: Updates an address of the used forwarding rules manager contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _manager
parameterDecorators.description: address of forwarding rules manager contract.

functionDecorators.name: setGasLimitManager
functionDecorators.description: Updates an address of the used gas limit manager contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _manager
parameterDecorators.description: address of gas limit manager contract.

functionDecorators.name: setMediatorContractOnOtherSide
functionDecorators.description: Sets the mediator contract address from the other network. Only the owner can call this method.

parameterDecorators.name: _mediatorContract
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the mediator contract.

functionDecorators.name: setTokenImageERC1155
functionDecorators.description: Updates address of the used ERC1155 token image. Only owner can call this method.

parameterDecorators.name: _image
parameterDecorators.description: address of the new token image.

functionDecorators.name: setTokenImageERC721
functionDecorators.description: Updates address of the used ERC721 token image. Only owner can call this method.

parameterDecorators.name: _image
parameterDecorators.description: address of the new token image.

functionDecorators.name: tokenImageERC1155
functionDecorators.description: Tells the address of the used ERC1155 token image.

returnDecorators.description: address of the used token image.

functionDecorators.name: tokenImageERC721
functionDecorators.description: Tells the address of the used ERC721 token image.

returnDecorators.description: address of the used token image.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: the address to transfer ownership to.
